1.4 二次变换，迭代与基本极限方程的第三个证明

定理 1.2 关于 K 的迭代计算

对 k∈(0,1)k \in (0,1)k∈(0,1)

(a)K(k)=11+kK(2k1+k)模向上(a) \quad K(k) = \frac{1}{1+k} K\left(\frac{2\sqrt{k}}{1+k}\right) \quad \text{模向上} (a)K(k)=1+k1​K(1+k2k​​)模向上

现给一个 Ivory 的 (b) 的证明

=1+l2+l(ei2θ+e−i2θ)=(1+le−2iθ)(1+le2iθ)= 1+l^2+l(e^{i2\theta}+e^{-i2\theta}) = (1+le^{-2i\theta})(1+le^{2i\theta}) =1+l2+l(ei2θ+e−i2θ)=(1+le−2iθ)(1+le2iθ)

算法 1.2

令 a0=1,b0=k′∈(0,1],c0=ka_0=1, b_0=k' \in (0,1], c_0=ka0​=1,b0​=k′∈(0,1],c0​=k （这对 kn=cnan,kn′=bnank_n=\frac{c_n}{a_n}, k_n'=\frac{b_n}{a_n}kn​=an​cn​​,kn′​=an​bn​​ 符合的）

K(k)=π2M(1,k′)(a)\tag{a} \quad K(k) = \frac{\pi}{2 M(1, k')} K(k)=2M(1,k′)π​(a)

E(k)=(1−∑n=0∞2n−1cn2)K(k)(b)\tag{b} \quad E(k) = (1 - \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} 2^{n-1} c_n^2) K(k) E(k)=(1−n=0∑∞​2n−1cn2​)K(k)(b)

Proof. (a) 是定理 1.1。对 (b)，我们使用 定理 1.3

2J(an+1,bn+1)−J(an,bn)=anbnI(an,bn)=anbnI(a0,b0)2J(a_{n+1}, b_{n+1}) - J(a_n, b_n) = a_n b_n I(a_n, b_n) = a_n b_n I(a_0, b_0) 2J(an+1​,bn+1​)−J(an​,bn​)=an​bn​I(an​,bn​)=an​bn​I(a0​,b0​)

由于 anbna_n b_nan​bn​ 这东西 求和不太行？（上式乘 2n2^n2n 可列项相消）

把 anbna_n b_nan​bn​ 化开，使用 cnc_ncn​。由于

4an+12−2an2−2anbn=4an2+bn2+2anbn4−2an2−2anbn=bn2−an2=−cn2\begin{aligned} 4a_{n+1}^2 - 2a_n^2 - 2a_n b_n &= 4 \frac{a_n^2+b_n^2+2a_n b_n}{4} - 2a_n^2 - 2a_n b_n \\ &= b_n^2 - a_n^2 = -c_n^2 \end{aligned} 4an+12​−2an2​−2an​bn​​=44an2​+bn2​+2an​bn​​−2an2​−2an​bn​=bn2​−an2​=−cn2​​

∴anbn=2an+12−an2+12cn2, 代入 J 那式子\therefore \quad a_n b_n = 2a_{n+1}^2 - a_n^2 + \frac{1}{2} c_n^2, \text{ 代入 } J \text{ 那式子} ∴an​bn​=2an+12​−an2​+21​cn2​, 代入 J 那式子

2J(an+1,bn+1)−J(an,bn)=2an+12I(a0,b0)−an2I(a0,b0)+12cn2I(a0,b0)2J(a_{n+1}, b_{n+1}) - J(a_n, b_n) = 2a_{n+1}^2 I(a_0, b_0) - a_n^2 I(a_0, b_0) + \frac{1}{2} c_n^2 I(a_0, b_0) 2J(an+1​,bn+1​)−J(an​,bn​)=2an+12​I(a0​,b0​)−an2​I(a0​,b0​)+21​cn2​I(a0​,b0​)

则

2J(an+1,bn+1)−2an+12I(a0,b0)−(J(an,bn)−an2I(a0,b0))=12cn2I(a0,b0)2J(a_{n+1}, b_{n+1}) - 2a_{n+1}^2 I(a_0, b_0) - (J(a_n, b_n) - a_n^2 I(a_0, b_0)) = \frac{1}{2} c_n^2 I(a_0, b_0) 2J(an+1​,bn+1​)−2an+12​I(a0​,b0​)−(J(an​,bn​)−an2​I(a0​,b0​))=21​cn2​I(a0​,b0​)

两边同乘 2n2^n2n

2n+1[J(an+1,bn+1)−an+12I(a0,b0)]−2n[J(an,bn)−an2I(a0,b0)]=2n−1cn2I(a0,b0)2^{n+1}[J(a_{n+1}, b_{n+1}) - a_{n+1}^2 I(a_0, b_0)] - 2^n [J(a_n, b_n) - a_n^2 I(a_0, b_0)] = 2^{n-1} c_n^2 I(a_0, b_0) 2n+1[J(an+1​,bn+1​)−an+12​I(a0​,b0​)]−2n[J(an​,bn​)−an2​I(a0​,b0​)]=2n−1cn2​I(a0​,b0​)

对 n=0n=0n=0 到 NNN 求和

2N+1(J(aN+1,bN+1)−aN+12I(a0,b0))−(J(a0,b0)−a02I(a0,b0))=∑0N2n−1cn2I(a0,b0)=I(a0,b0)∑0N2n−1cn2\begin{aligned} 2^{N+1}(J(a_{N+1}, b_{N+1}) - a_{N+1}^2 I(a_0, b_0)) - (J(a_0, b_0) - a_0^2 I(a_0, b_0)) &= \sum_{0}^{N} 2^{n-1} c_n^2 I(a_0, b_0) \\ &= I(a_0, b_0) \sum_{0}^{N} 2^{n-1} c_n^2 \end{aligned} 2N+1(J(aN+1​,bN+1​)−aN+12​I(a0​,b0​))−(J(a0​,b0​)−a02​I(a0​,b0​))​=0∑N​2n−1cn2​I(a0​,b0​)=I(a0​,b0​)0∑N​2n−1cn2​​

若 N→∞N \to \inftyN→∞ 时， 2N+1(J(aN+1,bN+1)−aN+12I(a0,b0))→02^{N+1}(J(a_{N+1}, b_{N+1}) - a_{N+1}^2 I(a_0, b_0)) \to 02N+1(J(aN+1​,bN+1​)−aN+12​I(a0​,b0​))→0 就证完了 (b)

考虑

Δn=2n[an2I(an,bn)−J(an,bn)]=2n[an2∫0π2dθan2cos⁡2θ+bn2sin⁡2θ−∫0π2an2cos⁡2θ+bn2sin⁡2θdθ]=2n∫0π2(an2−bn2)sin⁡2θan2cos⁡2θ+bn2sin⁡2θdθ=2ncn2∫0π2sin⁡2θan2cos⁡2θ+bn2sin⁡2θdθ\begin{aligned} \Delta_n &= 2^n [a_n^2 I(a_n, b_n) - J(a_n, b_n)] \\ &= 2^n \left[ a_n^2 \int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{d\theta}{\sqrt{a_n^2\cos^2\theta+b_n^2\sin^2\theta}} - \int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sqrt{a_n^2\cos^2\theta+b_n^2\sin^2\theta} d\theta \right] \\ &= 2^n \int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{(a_n^2 - b_n^2)\sin^2\theta}{\sqrt{a_n^2\cos^2\theta+b_n^2\sin^2\theta}} d\theta \\ &= 2^n c_n^2 \int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\sin^2\theta}{\sqrt{a_n^2\cos^2\theta+b_n^2\sin^2\theta}} d\theta \end{aligned} Δn​​=2n[an2​I(an​,bn​)−J(an​,bn​)]=2n​an2​∫02π​​an2​cos2θ+bn2​sin2θ​dθ​−∫02π​​an2​cos2θ+bn2​sin2θ​dθ​=2n∫02π​​an2​cos2θ+bn2​sin2θ​(an2​−bn2​)sin2θ​dθ=2ncn2​∫02π​​an2​cos2θ+bn2​sin2θ​sin2θ​dθ​

由于 sin⁡2θ≤1\sin^2\theta \le 1sin2θ≤1，

0≤Δn≤2ncn2I(an,bn)=2ncn2I(a0,b0)0 \le \Delta_n \le 2^n c_n^2 I(a_n, b_n) = 2^n c_n^2 I(a_0, b_0) 0≤Δn​≤2ncn2​I(an​,bn​)=2ncn2​I(a0​,b0​)

又 cn=cn−124an−1c_n = \frac{c_{n-1}^2}{4a_{n-1}}cn​=4an−1​cn−12​​，cnc_ncn​ 是二阶收敛到 0。那么乘个 2n2^n2n，cnc_ncn​ 仍 →0\to 0→0。则 Δn→0\Delta_n \to 0Δn​→0。

∴\therefore∴ 上述 N→∞N \to \inftyN→∞ 有

−J(a0,b0)+a02I(a0,b0)=I(a0,b0)∑n=0∞2n−1cn2-J(a_0, b_0) + a_0^2 I(a_0, b_0) = I(a_0, b_0) \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} 2^{n-1} c_n^2 −J(a0​,b0​)+a02​I(a0​,b0​)=I(a0​,b0​)n=0∑∞​2n−1cn2​

整理得

J(a0,b0)=(a02−∑n=0∞2n−1cn2)I(a0,b0)J(a_0, b_0) = \left( a_0^2 - \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} 2^{n-1} c_n^2 \right) I(a_0, b_0) J(a0​,b0​)=(a02​−n=0∑∞​2n−1cn2​)I(a0​,b0​)

由于 J(a0,b0)=a0E′(b0a0)=a0E(c0a0)J(a_0, b_0) = a_0 E'(\frac{b_0}{a_0}) = a_0 E(\frac{c_0}{a_0})J(a0​,b0​)=a0​E′(a0​b0​​)=a0​E(a0​c0​​)

I(a0,b0)=1a0K′(b0a0)=1a0K(c0a0)I(a_0, b_0) = \frac{1}{a_0} K'(\frac{b_0}{a_0}) = \frac{1}{a_0} K(\frac{c_0}{a_0})I(a0​,b0​)=a0​1​K′(a0​b0​​)=a0​1​K(a0​c0​​)

又 a0=1,b0=k′,c0=ka_0=1, b_0=k', c_0=ka0​=1,b0​=k′,c0​=k

∴E(k)=(1−∑n=0∞2n−1cn2)K(k)\therefore \quad E(k) = \left(1 - \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} 2^{n-1} c_n^2\right) K(k) ∴E(k)=(1−n=0∑∞​2n−1cn2​)K(k)
